+00000c50: 6765 0a0a 2323 2320 4261 7369 6320 7472  ge..### Basic tr
+00000c60: 616e 736c 6174 696f 6e3a 0a0a 6060 6062  anslation:..```b

+00000cb0: 706c 653a 0a0a 6060 6062 6173 680a 6169  ple:..```bash.ai
+00000cc0: 6c69 6e67 6f20 6d79 5f64 6f63 756d 656e  lingo my_documen
+00000cd0: 742e 7478 7420 2d2d 7461 7267 6574 206a  t.txt --target j
+00000ce0: 610a 6060 600a 0a54 6869 7320 7769 6c6c  a.```..This will
+00000cf0: 2074 7261 6e73 6c61 7465 2060 6d79 5f64   translate `my_d

+00000d40: 4279 2064 6566 6175 6c74 2c20 6974 2077  By default, it w

+00000d90: 7566 6669 787d 602e 0a0a 2323 2320 4669  uffix}`...### Fi
+00000da0: 6c65 206e 616d 6520 6573 7469 6d61 7469  le name estimati
+00000db0: 6f6e 2062 7920 7370 6563 6966 7969 6e67  on by specifying
+00000dc0: 2074 6865 2073 6f75 7263 6520 6c61 6e67   the source lang
+00000dd0: 7561 6765 3a0a 0a60 6060 6261 7368 0a61  uage:..```bash.a
+00000de0: 696c 696e 676f 202f 7061 7468 2f74 6f2f  ilingo /path/to/
+00000df0: 656e 2f6d 795f 646f 6375 6d65 6e74 2e74  en/my_document.t
+00000e00: 7874 202d 2d73 6f75 7263 6520 656e 202d  xt --source en -
+00000e10: 2d74 6172 6765 7420 6a61 0a60 6060 0a0a  -target ja.```..
+00000e20: 5468 6973 2077 696c 6c20 7472 616e 736c  This will transl
+00000e30: 6174 6520 606d 795f 646f 6375 6d65 6e74  ate `my_document
+00000e40: 2e74 7874 6020 696e 746f 204a 6170 616e  .txt` into Japan
+00000e50: 6573 6520 616e 6420 7361 7665 2069 7420  ese and save it 
+00000e60: 6173 2060 2f70 6174 682f 746f 2f6a 612f  as `/path/to/ja/
+00000e70: 6d79 5f64 6f63 756d 656e 742e 7478 7460  my_document.txt`
+00000e80: 2e20 5468 6973 2066 6561 7475 7265 2072  . This feature r
+00000e90: 6570 6c61 6365 7320 7468 6520 736f 7572  eplaces the sour
+00000ea0: 6365 206c 616e 6775 6167 6520 636f 6465  ce language code
+00000eb0: 2077 6974 6820 7468 6520 7461 7267 6574   with the target
+00000ec0: 206c 616e 6775 6167 6520 636f 6465 2069   language code i
+00000ed0: 6620 7468 6520 6669 6c65 206e 616d 6520  f the file name 
+00000ee0: 6f72 2064 6972 6563 746f 7279 206e 616d  or directory nam
+00000ef0: 6520 636f 6e74 6169 6e73 2074 6865 2073  e contains the s
+00000f00: 6f75 7263 6520 6c61 6e67 7561 6765 2063  ource language c
+00000f10: 6f64 652e 0a0a 2d20 4578 616d 706c 653a  ode...- Example:
+00000f20: 2060 646f 6375 6d65 6e74 2e65 6e2e 7478   `document.en.tx
+00000f30: 7460 20e2 8692 2060 646f 6375 6d65 6e74  t` ... `document
+00000f40: 2e6a 612e 7478 7460 0a2d 2045 7861 6d70  .ja.txt`.- Examp
+00000f50: 6c65 3a20 606c 6f63 616c 6573 2f65 6e2f  le: `locales/en/
+00000f60: 4c43 5f4d 4553 5341 4745 532f 6d65 7373  LC_MESSAGES/mess
+00000f70: 6167 652e 706f 6020 e286 9220 606c 6f63  age.po` ... `loc
+00000f80: 616c 6573 2f6a 612f 4c43 5f4d 4553 5341  ales/ja/LC_MESSA
+00000f90: 4745 532f 6d65 7373 6167 652e 706f 600a  GES/message.po`.
+00000fa0: 0a4e 6f74 653a 2054 6869 7320 6175 746f  .Note: This auto
+00000fb0: 6d61 7469 6320 6573 7469 6d61 7469 6f6e  matic estimation
+00000fc0: 2064 6f65 7320 6e6f 7420 6170 706c 7920   does not apply 
+00000fd0: 6966 2079 6f75 2073 7065 6369 6679 2061  if you specify a
+00000fe0: 6e20 6f75 7470 7574 2066 696c 6520 6e61  n output file na
+00000ff0: 6d65 2070 6174 7465 726e 2077 6974 6820  me pattern with 
+00001000: 7468 6520 602d 2d6f 7574 7075 7460 206f  the `--output` o
+00001010: 7074 696f 6e2e 0a0a 2323 2320 4d75 6c74  ption...### Mult
+00001020: 6970 6c65 2066 696c 6573 2061 6e64 2074  iple files and t

+00001070: 6a61 2c65 732c 6672 0a60 6060 0a0a 5468  ja,es,fr.```..Th
+00001080: 6973 2077 696c 6c20 7472 616e 736c 6174  is will translat
+00001090: 6520 6066 696c 6531 2e74 7874 6020 616e  e `file1.txt` an
+000010a0: 6420 6066 696c 6532 2e68 746d 6c60 2069  d `file2.html` i
+000010b0: 6e74 6f20 4a61 7061 6e65 7365 2c20 5370  nto Japanese, Sp
+000010c0: 616e 6973 682c 2061 6e64 2046 7265 6e63  anish, and Frenc
+000010d0: 682e 0a0a 2323 2320 5370 6563 6966 7969  h...### Specifyi
